TypeScript基础（基础类型） 下一篇

常见流式布局总结
如何利用webpack打包各种各样的文件资源

Webpack管理资源

Webpack如何打包各种不同的文件资源依赖

打包对应文件前请先安装对应loader

项目架构

  webpack-demo
  |- package.json
  |- webpack.config.js
  |- /dist
    |- bundle.js
    |- index.html
  |- /src
   	|- data.xml
    |- my-font.woff
    |- my-font.woff2
    |- icon.png
    |- style.css
    |- index.js
  |- /node_modules

最终效果

package.json

{
  "name": "webpack-demo",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "",
  "private": true,
  "scripts": {
    "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1",
    "build": "webpack"
  },
  "keywords": [],
  "author": "",
  "license": "ISC",
  "devDependencies": {
    "css-loader": "^5.0.1",
    "csv-loader": "^3.0.3",
    "file-loader": "^6.2.0",
    "style-loader": "^2.0.0",
    "webpack": "^5.5.1",
    "webpack-cli": "^4.2.0",
    "xml-loader": "^1.2.1"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "lodash": "^4.17.20"
  }
}

index.js

import _ from 'lodash';
import './style.css';
import headerImage from './header2.jpg'; //图片路径将是打包后的最终路径
import data1 from './data.csv';
import data2 from './data.xml';

function component(){
    var element = document.createElement('div');

    //lodash, 现在由此脚本导入
    element.innerHTML = _.join(['Hello', 'webpack'], '');
    element.classList.add('hello');

    //将图像添加到我们现有的div
    var image = new Image();
    image.src = headerImage;

    document.body.appendChild(image);
    console.log(data1);
    console.log(data2.note);
    return element;
}

document.body.appendChild(component());

webpack.config.js

const path = require('path');

module.exports = {
    entry: './src/index.js',
    output: {
        filename: 'bundle.js',
        path: path.resolve(__dirname, 'dist')
    },
    module: {
        rules: [
            {
                test: /\.css$/,
                use: [
                    'style-loader',
                    'css-loader'
                ]
            },
            {
                test: /\.(png|svg|jpg|gif)$/,
                use: [
                    'file-loader'
                ]
            },
            {
                test: /\.(wolf|eot|ttf|otf)$/,
                use: [
                    'file-loader'
                ]
            },
            {
                test: /\.(csv|tsv)$/,
                use: [
                    'csv-loader'
                ]
            },
            {
                test: /\.xml$/,
                use: [
                    'xml-loader'
                ]
            }
        ]
    }
}
